idea-plugin.name: TabSweep
idea-plugin.description:
Sweep through your tabs with ease. A powerful tab management plugin inspired by Emacs buffer management.

Features:

  • View all open tabs in a unified popup dialog
  • Fuzzy search to quickly find tabs
  • Select multiple tabs using checkboxes or spacebar
  • Close selected tabs in bulk
  • Keyboard-navigable interface (Up/Down arrows, Spacebar to select)
  • De-duplicated file list (files shown once even if open in multiple splits)
  • Quick close individual tabs with X button

Usage:

Use Ctrl+O, B to open TabSweep.

action.description: Open the TabSweep dialog to manage open tabs
